pullrequest.title: Building Editor: Pick wall / floor / stairs texture from a pre-set list on inspector

content.raw:
Nope, pull request #1308 fixes the blinking but not the texture issue :/ Sorry for leaving this here, maybe I should decline the PR until this is figured out.

Interestingly, assigning texture to the floor with the mouse on branch `hitl_usability` works, but even there assigning from the inspector is bad.
content.html:
Nope, pull request #1308 fixes the blinking but not the texture issue :/ Sorry for leaving this here, maybe I should decline the PR until this is figured out.

Interestingly, assigning texture to the floor with the mouse on branch hitl_usability works, but even there assigning from the inspector is bad.
